homepage.about:
Born and based in Colombia. I believe in designing things with passion to solve problems with usability and aesthetics in mind. I speak C1 English and native Spanish.

I am a Neovim fan; I love to work with TypeScript and Tailwind on the front end, with Python or Go on the back end, and the terminal is my best friend.

Computers have always been my main interest, from customizing them to building them. There is something about having artistic control over a computer that I enjoy a lot. I also make music for fun and post it on my SoundCloud. These days, I try to keep myself active by skateboarding, because to no one's surprise, as a developer I spend too much time in a chair.

Feel free to reach out to me via Twitter or

  • LinkedIn
    • if you wish to collaborate or talk!
